function.description:
Connect to a Microsoft SQL Server To connect to MSSQL you need to provide a connection string that contains all the required information. The simple format of the connection string is:
jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://[server][:port][/database][;[property]=[value][;...]]
Example:
jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://localhost/Finance;instance=sqlexpress;user=MyUserName;password=MyPassword
Read more at: [What is the URL format used by jTDS?](http://jtds.sourceforge.net/faq.html#urlFormat)
